skills.name: Elements Drive
skills.description: [SP: 9][CD: 12s] Continually discharges lightning, fire, and ice elements, each dealing 240% Physical DMG plus 240% of the corresponding Elemental DMG. Each corresponding Elemental DMG can either paralyze, ignite, or freeze enemies. The skill can be charged 3 times.For a period after using the active skill (lightning: 4s, Fire: 7s, Ice: 10s), all enemies in the battlefield take 100% ATK of Elemental DMG from lightning, meteors, or hailstones every 1s.

skills.name: Sword Defence
skills.description: Charged ATK gains 20% Total DMG Multiplier. When attacked or after Ultimate Evasion, launch 2 penetrating ethereal Xuanyuan swords towards the enemy target, knocking all enemies airborne along the way and dealing 200% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies hit. CD: 10s.

skills.name: Key of Domination
skills.description: In co-op raids, team gains 20.0% All Elemental DMG and takes 15.0% All Elemental DMG Reduction for 6.0s whenever a character uses a weapon skill.
